faqs.question: Are my photos safe?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Your photos never leave your device. Everything runs offline. We can't see your photos â€” and we don't want to.

faqs.question: What are AI Albums?
faqs.answer: Your photos automatically sorted into smart categories: People, Couples, Pets, and Scenes (beach, city, food, travel). Find any photo without scrolling forever.

faqs.question: If I delete a photo, is it gone forever?
faqs.answer: No. Deleted photos are moved to the "Recently Deleted" album in your system Photos app. They will be kept there for 30 days before being permanently removed by iOS. You can recover them anytime within that period.

faqs.question: How much does SwipeClean cost?
faqs.answer: We offer a 3-day free trial with full access to all features. After the trial, it is $9.99/week (auto-renewable). We'll remind you before your trial ends â€” no surprise charges. Cancel anytime in Settings â†’ Subscriptions.

faqs.question: What's included in the free trial?
faqs.answer: Full access to all features for 3 days: duplicate detection, similar photos cleanup, AI albums, and all cleanup tools. No limitations.

faqs.question: How do I restore my purchase?
faqs.answer: Go to SwipeClean Settings > Premium, and tap "Restore Purchase".

features.title: Daily Check-In
features.description: Scheduled safety reminders and wellness alerts.

features.title: Emergency Contact
features.description: Quick access to emergency contacts and notifications.

features.title: Privacy First
features.description: Your data stays on your device. End-to-end protected.

features.title: Lone Worker Protection
features.description: Safety monitoring for solo work and travel.

faqs.question: How does SafeAlone work?
faqs.answer: SafeAlone helps solo workers and travelers stay safe by providing daily check-ins, emergency alerts, and direct contact with emergency contacts when needed.

faqs.question: Is my information private?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Your data is encrypted and never stored on our servers. Everything is processed locally on your device.

faqs.question: Can I customize check-in schedules?
faqs.answer: Yes. You can set custom check-in times and frequency based on your work or travel schedule.

faqs.question: What happens if I miss a check-in?
faqs.answer: SafeAlone will send you reminder notifications. If you continue to miss check-ins, it will automatically notify your emergency contacts.

faqs.question: How much does SafeAlone cost?
faqs.answer: We offer a free version with basic features. Premium features are available through a subscription for enhanced protection and customization.
